promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic swan normal-type pokemon wearing dark gemstones. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemplume, a a chibi cute basic swan normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Triple Slap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "normal" or "Gemplume". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, swan-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: This playful creature flutters about village squares, enchanting all with its jewel-encrusted feathers. Its Triple Slap is a charming spectacle.
